Package org.red5.codec

Class AbstractVideo

java.lang.Object
org.red5.codec.AbstractVideo
All Implemented Interfaces:
IVideoStreamCodec
Direct Known Subclasses:
AV1Video, AVCVideo, HEVCVideo, MPEG1Video, ScreenVideo, ScreenVideo2, SorensonVideo, VP8Video
public class AbstractVideo extends Object implements IVideoStreamCodec
Abstract video codec implementation.
Author:
mondain

    • addData

      public boolean addData(org.apache.mina.core.buffer.IoBuffer data, int timestamp, boolean amf)
      Add video data with a time stamp and a flag identifying the content as AMF or not.
      Specified by:
      addData in interface IVideoStreamCodec
      Parameters:
      data - a IoBuffer object
      timestamp - a int
      amf - if true, data is in AMF format otherwise its most likely from non-AMF source like RTP
      Returns:
      true if data is added and false otherwise

    • getTrackCodec

      public VideoCodec getTrackCodec(int trackIndex)
      Returns a track codec for the given track index. This is only good for a single track as it will return the first codec found. In a multi-track scenario, the proper look-up should be done by the track's fourcc.
      Parameters:
      trackIndex - a int
      Returns:
      Video codec at the index or null if no track exist
